events.message: I received the wrong item in my order and want to request a refund as soon as possible.
System detected keywords related to refund and return for proper case routing.
The case was assigned to a customer support agent specialized in returns and refunds.
Hello! I’m sorry to hear about the issue with your order. I’m here to help you with the refund process.
Could you please provide your order number and a photo of the item you received to begin the refund?
Here is the order number 123456789 and I have attached the photos showing the incorrect item delivered.
Thank you for the details. We have approved your refund request and you should see the amount back in your account within 5-7 business days.
Thank you for the quick response and resolution. I’m happy with the refund arrangement.
We have processed the refund successfully and consider this case resolved. Please contact us if you need anything else.
Just checking in to confirm that your refund was received without any issues. Let us know if there is anything else we can assist you with.
Closing the case now as the refund process has been completed and the customer confirmed satisfaction.
A satisfaction survey invitation has been sent to the customer to gather feedback on their support experience.
